name: Pinball Frenzy 3D (itch)
description:
Pinball Frenzy 3D establishes a new standard about on-device pinball games, thanks to its hyper-realistic physic and the quality of its graphics and sound ambience.

Find back the atmosphere of the best pub games et make proof of dexterity and ability like at the great era of pinball madness!

How to play:

Enter: Launch ball

S: Flip Left

L: Flip Right

Space, D, K: Tilt Front, Left, Right
